title: Mariah Smith Articles
cleaned_text:
• Because it is derived from verses all over Scripture, Handel’s Messiah is about more than just Christ’s advent or resurrection and has application year-round.
• On the surface, Turning Red is a colorful coming-of-age Disney+ movie about a teenage girl figuring out who she wants to be during the highs and lows of adolescence.
• George Washington Carver: Journey from Slave to Scientist by God’s Grace George Washington Carver was a shining example of a Christian scientist who, through faith in God, saw and glorified his Creator in his scientific endeavors.
• Birds, bats, bees, butterflies, and all sorts of living things are responsible for keeping the plants all around us growing and healthy.
• Carl Linnaeus, also called the father of taxonomy, created the system for the classification of plants and animals known today as the Linnaean System.
• Pasteur is known as the founder of microbiological sciences and praised even today for the many lives he saved with his vaccinations.
• Genesis 1 and 2 seem to indicate different times for the creation of Eve. Was Eve created on Day Six or not?
